message:
Hi I implemented your WindowsServiceLifetime, but every time I run the program with the inclusion of 
services.AddSingleton(IHostLifetime, MyWindowsServiceLifetime)();
I keep getting an System.ArgumentException: 'Source property was not set before writing to the event log.'
System.InvalidOperationException: 'Stopped without starting'
I'm using net core 3.1.8
Just checking if you ran into that?
When I remove that line it works, but obviously the behavior changes and does not pass the correct exit 
Thanks for any help you can provide! -Corey
